collectible.title: Miku's Leek
collectible.subtitle: Perfect for doing the Ievan Polka!
collectible.text: "I didn't come with a leek, but I wouldn't mind having one!" Well, now you do!

collectible.title: Triple Baka Card
collectible.subtitle: A secret collectible?! Oh my gosh!
collectible.text: No, there are not 3 people here, but you've got to admit, it is funny. Plus, It's signed, so you know it'll have extra value when you sell it on eBay!
